name: Jigsaw Puzzles: Animals, Dinosaurs & Cars
description:
The Jigsaw Puzzles: Animals, Dinosaurs & Cars is a wonderful puzzle game for adults and children. It contains puzzles from different fields that you will love such as animals, vehicles, princess world. 

Many thoughts were invested to provide this educational and entertaining app at the same time.

The game offers several key features:
✔ The square pieces of the puzzle challenge the player much more than the traditional jigsaw puzzle. This mode helps the player to focus on finding the next adjacent small piece instead of focusing on finding piece's location based on its shape.
✔ A limited number of pieces are displayed for selection at a time. We have developed a special smart algorithm which decides which of the missing pieces to show during the play time. 
✔ The game tracks the player's progress, and adjusts the complexity of the puzzle accordingly.
✔ The player can select the number of small pieces in the puzzle. 4, 9, 16, 25 and 36 small pieces are available (36 pieces available on Tablet only).
✔ A smart hint system is developed to decide when the user needs help. After a predefined number of multiple successive errors, the puzzle is displayed in black&white color to help the player proceeding. The hint disappears after succeeding one piece. The hint algorithm may also decide to show the hint constantly in some cases.
✔ A cute interactive chick animation is displayed every several puzzles to provide more fun while playing the game.

In addition, the application contains the traditional jigsaw puzzle with images of: animals, dinosaurs, cars, birds, princess, pony, fairy-tales and other cool images.

We, at Forqan Smart Tech, have always sought to provide the best for your family through applications designed, and directed each age group separately, our belief in the feature each evolutionary stage passes by your son, but in order to lend life skills and the mentality to learn and grow and play correctly and properly, and to communicate with his peers and the environment surrounding it.
